statements: UPDATE user_preferences SET currency='USD', language='English', theme='Light' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_preferences SET theme='Dark', currency='EUR', language='German' WHERE user_id='98765432-1234-5678-9101-210987654321';
UPDATE user_preferences SET currency = 'USD', language = 'English', theme = 'Dark' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_preferences SET language = 'Spanish', theme = 'Light', currency = 'EUR' WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-6g7h8-i9j0k1l2m3n4o5';
UPDATE user_preferences SET currency_preferences = '{"USD": "on", "EUR": "off"}' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE service_settings SET notification_settings = '{"email": true, "push": false}' WHERE service_id = 56789;
UPDATE user_preferences SET currency_preferences = '{"usd": 1, "eur": 0.9}' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE service_settings SET notification_settings = '{"email": true, "sms": true}', display_settings = '{"dark_mode": true}' WHERE service_id = 456 AND user_id = 123
UPDATE user_preferences SET theme = 'dark' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_wallet SET balance = 1500.75 WHERE wallet_id = 101;
UPDATE user_preferences SET theme = 'dark', notification_settings = true WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_wallet SET balance = balance + 100.00, last_updated = NOW() WHERE wallet_id = 456;
UPDATE user_preferences SET theme = 'dark' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE security_settings SET two_factor_auth = TRUE, password_hash='hashedpassword' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_preferences SET theme = 'dark' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE security_settings SET two_factor_auth = true, password_hash = 'new_password_hash' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE UserPreferences SET theme = 'dark' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE Wallet SET balance = 100.50, currency = 'USD' WHERE wallet_id = 54321;
UPDATE UserPreferences SET notification_settings = '{"email": true, "sms": true}' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE Wallet SET balance = balance + 100.50 WHERE user_id = 54321 AND currency = 'USD';
